img_text: Branden VanBTM Just now Step 1: Rent out Air BnB Step 2: Put mistletoes all over ther house Step 3: Add in a couple pair of boxing gloves Step 4: Throw a Christmas party Rule #1: Whoever meets under the mistletoe must dawn a pair of boxing gloves and fight. Rule #2 First one to the floor has to take a double shot and sit for 5 mins before re entering. Yes, this is a Christmas fight club party) e's halls are gonna get deck eon
